div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: A Regular Meeting of the Board of Trustees of Jourdanton Independent School District will be held April 20, 2020, beginning at 7:00 PM in the JISD Jr. High School Library; Zoom Video/Audio...

img.alt: Remote Learning begins at JISD April 6th

h3.a: Remote Learning begins at JISD April 6th

div.p: Due to the COVID-19 school closure through April 24th, JISD staff are hard at work preparing our Remote Learning Opportunities for our students. We are committed to supporting our student learning...
Instructional Resources- Below you will find instructional resources that have been vetted by our instructional team. We suggest spending 30-45 minutes daily for math and reading. If you need...

Remote instruction will begin on April 6th. We are taking this week to get students and teachers signed in and familiar with Google Classroom. Please click the link to watch a brief overview for parents and student regarding Google Classroom. https://youtu.be/kL0UmPkk310

eople with no symptoms have the potential to unknowingly spread COVID-19! That’s why it’s best for everyone in your family to stay at home and away from others as much as possible until instructed otherwise from state and local officials. #StayHomeTexas

Texas, remember the importance of social distancing. If you must go out, avoid public spaces and keep your distance from others (at least 6 feet). If we continue to follow valuable public health guidance, fewer of our friends & family will be affected by COVID-19. #StayHomeTexas

Common symptoms of #COVID19 are fever, dry cough, & shortness of breath. If you have mild symptoms, call your doctor & #StayHome. If you develop serious symptoms, such as trouble breathing, pressure in the chest, or bluish lips or face, call your doctor & seek care immediately.
